casebody.data:
[Hillsborough,

June, 1883.] Clough & a. v. Curtis. Reported 62 N. H. 409. Facts found by the court. The creditors’ motion to dismiss was granted, and the plaintiffs excepted. O. R. Morrison and J. H. Andrews, for the plaintiffs. Qopeland Lodge, for subsequent attaching creditors. *701Dob, C. J.

The alteration of the writ being material (Benson v. Ela, 35 N. H. 402, 417, Clough v. Curtis, 62 N. H. 409, 410, Moody v. Lucier, 62 N. H. 584, 587), and made after service, the action was rightly dismissed.

Exceptions overruled.

Stanley, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
